trans-unit.source: Provides information for the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.ErrorAddDataBoundRow" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.ErrorAddDataBoundRow" /> 事件的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.ErrorAddDataBoundRow> event is raised by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject> control if an exception occurs during an attempt to add a new row to the data source bound to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.ErrorAddDataBoundRow>事件由引发<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>如果尝试将新行添加到数据源过程中发生异常的控件绑定到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ErrorAddDataBoundRowEventArgs.Item%2A> property can be used to get the new item that the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject> tried to add.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ErrorAddDataBoundRowEventArgs.Item%2A>属性可以用于获取新项<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>尝试添加。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ErrorAddDataBoundRowEventArgs.InnerException%2A> property provides the exception that was thrown, and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ErrorAddDataBoundRowEventArgs.Retry%2A> property can be used to indicate whether another attempt to add this row should be made.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ErrorAddDataBoundRowEventArgs.InnerException%2A>属性提供已引发的异常和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ErrorAddDataBoundRowEventArgs.Retry%2A>属性可以用于指示是否应进行另一个尝试添加此行。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>, and binds the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Data.DataTable>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>，并将绑定<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>到<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: It then creates an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.ErrorAddDataBoundRow> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.ErrorAddDataBoundRow>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: To test the event, manually add a new row to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject> and enter the last name "Chan" and a first name.
trans-unit.target: 若要测试事件，手动向其中添加新行<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>输入姓氏"通道"和第一个名称。

trans-unit.source: The event handler displays a message.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序会显示一条消息。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> instance that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 获取导致当前异常的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that describes the error that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 的实例，描述导致当前异常的错误。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.ErrorAddDataBoundRow> event is raised as a direct result of an exception while attempting to add a new row to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.ErrorAddDataBoundRow>作为尝试将新行添加到数据源时出现异常的直接结果引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ErrorAddDataBoundRowEventArgs.InnerException%2A> property to obtain the exception that led to this error.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ErrorAddDataBoundRowEventArgs.InnerException%2A>属性来获取与此错误引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> that is bound to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject> control does not allow a column to be `null`, and the user does not specify a value for this column, the attempt to add the row causes a <xref:System.Data.NoNullAllowedException> to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，它绑定到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>控件不允许将一个列`null`，和用户未指定此列的值，尝试将该行添加导致<xref:System.Data.NoNullAllowedException>被引发。

trans-unit.source: Gets the new item that the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject" /> attempted to add to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject" /> 尝试添加到数据源的新项。

trans-unit.source: The item to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的项。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject> is bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, the item would be a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> rather than a <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>绑定到<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，该项应当是<xref:System.Data.DataRowView>而不是<xref:System.Data.DataRow>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject" /> should attempt to add the item again.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject" /> 是否应该再次尝试添加此项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if another attempt should be made; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果应进行另一个尝试;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject> encounters an error when attempting to add the new row, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.ErrorAddDataBoundRow> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>添加新行中，在尝试时遇到错误<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.ErrorAddDataBoundRow>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The developer can handle this event and attempt to fix any errors that occur.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以处理此事件，并尝试解决出现的任何错误。
